short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Draw, click, code! Turn your sketches into working code instantly with Claude.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your ideas into code with lightning speed! SketchToCode is your AI-powered companion that lets you quickly sketch and send visual concepts directly to Claude. Whether you're prototyping a UI design, outlining an algorithm flowchart, or explaining your code logic - simply draw your idea, and let Claude turn it into working code. No more lengthy text explanations or complex documentation - just draw, click, and code. Perfect for developers, designers, and anyone who thinks visually and codes digitally.

Key Features:
Lightning-fast browser-based sketching tool
Seamless integration with Claude
One-click image sharing
Streamlines the code generation workflow
